definition: far/distant/remote/(intensifier in a comparison) by far/much (lower etc)

sentences.english: Chaos Hydras are the most powerful creature of the Fortresses.
sentences.chinese: 远古巨兽是据点里最强大的生物。

sentences.english: DNF ancient belt task to do?
Age -old jade artifacts, gold and silver ornaments, and paintings - just to name a few.
sentences.chinese: 远古玉器，金银器，名画，还有好多其他的。

sentences.english: In ancient times, all things upon Earth smelled sweet like flowers.
sentences.chinese: 在远古时代，地球上的万物都闻起来就象花朵一样。

sentences.english: Several demigods were killed during the War of the Ancients, overwhelmed by demons.
sentences.chinese: 已经有几个半神在远古战争时期被恶魔杀死。

sentences.english: The brightest reddish stars in the cluster are ancient red giants.
sentences.chinese: 星团中最明亮的微红色恒星是远古的红巨星。

sentences.english: Tepi - the return of ancient knowledge at the end of this Cycle of Time.
sentences.chinese: 在这时间周期结束重现的远古知识。

sentences.english: Most primitive people noticed a relationship between time and shadows.
sentences.chinese: 许多远古人都注意到了时间和影的关系。

sentences.english: It was certainly from this proximity that the ancient ones drew their divinatory power.
sentences.chinese: 从这里，远古的人们汲取他们的占卜能力。

sentences.english: Worshipping Pangu dates back to the ancient customs of Pangu totem worship and Pangu mythology.
sentences.chinese: 盘瓠祭起源于远古的盘瓠图腾崇拜和盘瓠神话。

sentences.english: See, also the aggression, the Karma that you are doing are also ancient.
sentences.chinese: 你在做的侵略和业报也是远古时代的东西。

sentences.english: The festival traditional customs preserve pure and simple belief and witchery ceremony.
sentences.chinese: 其传统习俗保留着纯朴的信仰观念与远古的仪式。

sentences.english: Ballistae now have an" Attack Ground" command.
sentences.chinese: 远古弩车现在有“攻击地面”的命令了。

sentences.english: China is the birthplace of world's culture in remote antiquity.
sentences.chinese: 中国是世界远古文化的发祥地。

sentences.english: It is indicates based on abundant information that the original type of sage is koradji.
sentences.chinese: 文章用大量的资料论证了圣的原型是远古之巫祝。

sentences.english: In the old age black was not counted fair.
sentences.chinese: 在远古的时代黑并不算秀俊。

definition: the distant past/ancient times/antiquity/early historical times
throughout time/from ancient times (up to the present)
god/spirit/demon/occult or supernatural entities in general
